CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Salutation__c ), '', ucinn_ascendv2__Salutation__c & ' ') & IF ( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__First_Name__c ), '', ucinn_ascendv2__First_Name__c & ' ') & IF ( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Middle_Name__c ), '', ucinn_ascendv2__Middle_Name__c & ' ') & IF ( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Last_Name__c ), '', ucinn_ascendv2__Last_Name__c & ' ') & IF ( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Suffix__c ), '', ucinn_ascendv2__Suffix__c & ' ')
CustomField.label: Full Name
